ygData.subject: Re: 2h Slashing vs. 1h Blunt
ygData.msgSnippet: It does come in handy if you die.  No armor is a pain.. but no weapon is even worse.  I was killed (again) by a really... er.. green...MOB beause I couldnt run
ygData.messageBody:
It does come in handy if you die. No armor is a pain.. but no weapon is
even worse. I was killed (again) by a really... er.. green...MOB beause I
couldnt run away.. or do enough damage to kill it with my hands.... I
looked like a really wimpy monk.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Mamach [mailto:MMamach@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:46 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] 2h Slashing vs. 1h Blunt
>
>
> From: "Michael Mamach" <MMamach@...>
>
> I have recently gotten to the point where I can cap my 1H
> slashing but being
> a dwarf, I don't think I can keep both 2h slashing and 1h blunt up.
>
> Is summoning a hammer really useful other than just using it as a magical
> weapon before you can afford combine? I heard someone say that it is good
> because you can summon one after to die to get your body back. How will it
> help you if you have no armor though, you're running around naked with a
> hammer.
>
> I'm looking at 2h slashing but was wondering if anyone could tell
> me another
> use for 1h blunt that might change my mind. Thanks for your time.
>
> Gurtof, Dwarven knight of the 6th order.
>
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>
>
